definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Each clone has the same genetic information as the original.
sentences.chinese: 每個無性系都具有與母體相同的遺傳信息。

sentences.english: It is the particular sequence of the nucleotide blocks along the molecule that encodes the genetic information .
sentences.chinese: 沿着分子核苷酸的特定序列爲遺傳信息編碼。

sentences.english: Genes are tiny pieces of matter that carry information from parents to offspring.
sentences.chinese: 基因是一種將遺傳信息從父代傳給子代的微小物質。

sentences.english: Chromosomes carry the genetic information. Telomeres are buffers.
sentences.chinese: 染色體包含有遺傳信息。

sentences.english: The double-helical DNA is a very important intermediate in storing and transferring genetic informations.
sentences.chinese: DNA雙螺旋鏈是儲存和傳遞遺傳信息的重要載體。
